attributes.action: POTHOLES AND DEFECTS IN DUMFRIES AND GALLOWAY
attributes.additional_details:
After several weeks of bad weather , the existing roads network , both major roads and minor essential roads , are not fit for purpose , and all show signs of neglect and dis-repair. They can be described as appalling , and dangerous , and will potentially cause major damage to vehicles and potential serious injury to road users 
Funds must be released to enable this essential work of existing infrastructure, and not enough pressure is being applied to local MP's and elected officials.
attributes.background: The roads in Dumfries and Galloway are not fit for purpose , and more and more dangerous defects are appearing in the major arterial roads and are not being attended to , either timeously or with sufficient longevity to repairs.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
